mapper.select: SELECT POST_NUMBER, MEMBER_NUMBER, POST_TITLE, POST_LIKE_COUNT, POST_VIEW_COUNT, POST_REPORT_COUNT, DELETE_STATE, POST_CREATED_DATE, POST_UPDATED_DATE, POST_TYPE FROM TBL_POST WHERE POST_TYPE = 'FREE' ORDER BY POST_CREATED_DATE DESC

SELECT M.MEMBER_NUMBER AS memberNumber, M.MEMBER_ID AS memberId, P.POST_NUMBER AS postNumber, P.POST_TITLE AS postTitle, F.FREE_CONTENT AS postContent, P.POST_CREATED_DATE AS postCreatedDate, P.POST_VIEW_COUNT AS postViewCount FROM TBL_MEMBER M JOIN TBL_POST P ON P.MEMBER_NUMBER = M.MEMBER_NUMBER LEFT JOIN TBL_FREE_BOARD F ON F.POST_NUMBER = P.POST_NUMBER WHERE P.POST_NUMBER = #{postNumber}

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, SUBQUERY.* FROM ( SELECT p.POST_NUMBER, p.POST_TITLE,p.POST_TYPE,p.POST_CREATED_DATE,p.POST_VIEW_COUNT,p.POST_LIKE_COUNT, p.POST_DELETE_STATE, (SELECT count(c.COMMENT_NUMBER) FROM TBL_COMMENT c WHERE c.POST_NUMBER = p.POST_NUMBER ) AS comment_count FROM TBL_POST p WHERE p.MEMBER_NUMBER = #{memberNumber} AND p.POST_DELETE_STATE = 'N' ORDER BY p.POST_CREATED_DATE DESC ) SUBQUERY )
